TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MachineKeyValidationConverter extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase
Public NotInheritable Class MachineKeyValidationConverter Inherits ConfigurationConverterBase

Docs.summary: Provides methods for converting objects to and from strings.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource.MayLeakOnAbort>. The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md).

public: override System::Object ^ ConvertFrom(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ ctx, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ ci, System::Object ^ data);

Docs.summary: Converts a string to the equivalent value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception if the `data` parameter does not refer to one of the following strings:
- SHA1
- MD5
- 3DES
- AES

Docs.exception: The data is not one of the expected strings.
